result.eng: As far as I know, this is true.
result.ga: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.orig: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.html: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.
result.ponchtml: A ḟad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.

result.html: Fíor nó bréagachTrue or false?
result.ponchtml: Fíor nó bréagaċTrue or false?

result.html: Is fíor an ráiteas sinThat statement is true.
result.ponchtml: Is fíor an ráiteas sinThat statement is true.

result.html: Tá an ráiteas sin fíorThat statement is true.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ráiteas sin fíorThat statement is true.

result.ga: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainte
result.orig: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainte
result.html: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do ċuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.orig: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
